member.name: T:Microsoft.Windows.System.EnvironmentManager
member.summary: A class for reading and writing environment variables.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.System.EnvironmentManager.AddExecutableFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Adds the specified file extension to the end of the PATHEXT environment variable.
member.param: The file extension to be added to the PATHEXT environment variable.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.System.EnvironmentManager.AppendToPath(System.String)
member.summary: Adds the specified path to the end of the PATH environment variable.
member.param: The path to be appended to the PATH environment variable.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.System.EnvironmentManager.GetEnvironmentVariable(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the value of the specified environment variable at the scope of the current EnvironmentManager.
member.param: The name of the environment variable to fetch.
member.returns: The value for the specified environment variable.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.System.EnvironmentManager.GetEnvironmentVariables
member.summary: Gets a collection of environment variables at the scope of the current EnvironmentManager.
member.returns: A dictionary of environment variable key/value pairs.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.System.EnvironmentManager.GetForMachine
member.summary: Gets an EnvironmentManager at system-wide scope.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.System.EnvironmentManager.GetForProcess
member.summary: Gets an EnvironmentManager scoped to the current process.
member.returns: An EnvironmentManager scoped to the current process.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.System.EnvironmentManager.GetForUser
member.summary: Gets an EnvironmentManager scoped to the current user.
member.returns: An EnvironmentManager scoped to the current user.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.System.EnvironmentManager.RemoveExecutableFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the specified file extension from the end of the PATHEXT environment variable.
member.param: The file extension to be removed from the PATHEXT environment variable.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.System.EnvironmentManager.RemoveFromPath(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the specified path from the end of the PATH environment variable.
member.param: The path to be removed from the PATH environment variable.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Windows.System.EnvironmentManager.SetEnvironmentVariable(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets the value of the specified environment variable at the scope of the current EnvironmentManager.
member.param: The name of the environment variable to set.
The new value to set for the specified environment variable.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.System.EnvironmentManager.AreChangesTracked
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether environment variable changes are tracked.
member.returns: true if environment variable changes are tracked; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Windows.System.EnvironmentManager.IsSupported
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether EnvironmentManager is supported on the current device/OS version.
member.returns: true if EnvironmentManager is supported; otherwise, false.
